title: Cai Shang Baodian
synopsis: A Bao is the little God of Wealth in the heavens. He is smart, witty, passionate and active, and aspires to become a master of wealth management like his father God of Wealth. The gods from all walks of life heard about the ability of the God of Wealth and came to ask for help. A Bao brought his friends Pai Xiu and Jin Chan, Under the guidance of the God of Wealth, they explored the secrets of wealth and the mystery of wealth. They helped Monk Sha’s snack bar come back to life, and they have solved the problem of trash in the heavens, and saw business opportunities in Wu Gang’s Osmanthus Garden. (translated from douban)
